Posts.Content: linreed wrote: Hi Everyone!  I just learned that my 16 year old niece has a lump.  Is there any chance this is cancer?  Also, if it is just a cyst, then what will she need done?  She is scheduled for an ultrasound this week. Linda Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Diagnosed 4 years ago now 16 year old niece has lump linreed Beesie
